Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the major television networks provided little or no coverage of the repatriation ceremony, when in fact some coverage was provided.
Understate: The claim understates the amount of coverage provided by stating that there was little or no coverage, when in fact multiple reports were aired by the mentioned networks.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that there was little or no coverage.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the coverage may have been limited or not as extensive as desired, but still existed.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that MSNBC, NBC, CBS, and ABC did provide coverage of the repatriation ceremony, even though it may not have been live coverage.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by making a blanket statement about the lack of coverage without considering the specific details and context of the coverage provided.
